house_listing.house_description: Large end unit with huge lot lots of trees & shrubs.Extra room down can be used as 4th bedroom or family room.Carpet downstairs already ordered being installed shortly.Attached garage & extra driveway pad.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced,Skylights, Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
